on.from sentence: For cue detection , on the Sherlock dataset test data , we see that we outperform the best system [ FBK Chowdhury ] by 0.6 F1 measure .

BioScope Abstracts.from sentence: On the BioScope Abstracts , we perform reasonably well .

BioScope Full papers.from sentence: On the BioScope Full papers , we are able to achieve 90.43 F1 when training on the same data , but we do note that the amount of training data available is significantly lower than for the other datasets , and while general Deep Learning based approaches can not perform well in such situations , we still manage to perform well .

SFU Review Corpus.from sentence: On the SFU Review Corpus , we achieve an F1 of 87.08 .

Sherlock dataset.from sentence:
For scope resolution :
On the Sherlock dataset , we achieve an F1 of 92.36 , outperforming the previous State of the Art by a significant margin ( almost 3.0 F1 ) .

BioScope Abstracts.from sentence: On the BioScope Abstracts , we achieve an F1 of 95.68 , outperforming the best architecture by 3.57 F1 .

Bioscope Full Papers.from sentence: On the Bioscope Full Papers , we outperform the best architecture by 2.64 F1 when training on the same dataset

SFU Review Corpus.from sentence: On the SFU Review Corpus , we outperform the best system to date by 1.02 F1 .

significant gap.between: our model , NegBERT , and the current state - of the - art systems

outperform.from sentence: For negation cue detection , we observe a significant gap between our model , NegBERT , and the current state - of the - art systems , while we outperform the baseline systems .

BioScope Abstracts.from sentence: When we trained on BioScope Abstracts and tested on the BioScope Full Papers , we surprisingly observed a stateof - the - art result of 91.24 ( a gain of 3.89 F1 points over training on BioScope Full Papers ) , which is far beyond the achievable results on training and evaluating on the Bio-Medical sub corpora .
